entry.title: Instant / contactless payments
entry.summary: In a discussion about the responsibility of maintaining good/bad user lists, it was debated whether giving individual players that level of control and responsibility would be a positive or negative thing. The idea of linking wallets with Facebook accounts for instant payments was also brought up, with some arguing that if it requires little effort, some people might use it, but the user experience could be inconsistent and random. The importance of a consistent and intuitive user experience was emphasized.
